question: How many of Sony's top video game downloads for the EU in February 2025 will be sports games?
fine_print: A list of Playstation sports games, which Metaculus will consult for resolution, can be found [here](https://www.truetrophies.com/genre/Sports). It defines sports games as follows: "Sports games model an existing sport, complete with a set of rules and organized competition. They do not necessarily have to be simulations and may feature actions which are over-the-top, physically impossible, or not allowed within the real life activity." For example, Gran Turismo 7 is not classified as a sports game by that site, but EA SPORTS FC 25 is.

**Manchester City vs Real Madrid Live Football Streaming For UEFA Champions League 2024/25 Match: How to Watch MCI vs RM Coverage on TV And Online - News18**
Manchester City will face Real Madrid in the UEFA Champions League 2024/25 match on Wednesday, February 12, at the Etihad Stadium. Manchester City, who have struggled in the European club competition this season, secured a 3-1 victory over Club Brugge in their previous Champions League game. Real Madrid, who have won five out of eight Champions League matches this season, will be eyeing a second consecutive victory in the competition. The match will be televised on the Sony Sports Network in India and can be streamed live on the SonyLIV app and website. The predicted line-ups for the game have not been announced yet.

MLB The Show 25, the upcoming baseball game from Sony, has been confirmed to have a massive digital size of 26.4 GB on Nintendo Switch. The game is set to release on March 18, 2025, and will feature new gameplay mechanics, including RTTS, G.O.A.T difficulty, and improved sound effects. The game will also include authentic audio from high schools and universities, as well as improved sound effects and fan chants, thanks to ShowTech.

**Russia Sees Surge in Gaming Console Demand Amid Potential EU Ban**
According to Moneyplace, the demand for PlayStation and Xbox gaming consoles has increased by more than two times on marketplaces from January 28 to February 5, amid reports of a potential ban on their imports from the European Union. Anastasia Romanova, an analyst at Moneyplace, stated that in 2024, around 1000-1500 gaming consoles were sold per day in non-peak seasons. However, in 2025, this number rose to over 2700 units per day. In total, around 25,000 consoles were sold on marketplaces during the specified period, generating a revenue of 257.7 million rubles. The European Union's High Representative for Foreign Affairs, Kaja Kallas, proposed banning the import of gaming consoles to Russia in January, specifically mentioning PlayStation and Xbox. Maxim Kondratev, an expert, described this move as 'a hysteria or an attempt to divert attention.'
Original language: ru
Publish date: February 10, 2025 11:03 AM

**Russia Sees Surge in Demand for Consoles Amid Possible EU Ban**
The news of a possible ban on the import of PlayStation and Xbox consoles from the EU to Russia has led to a surge in demand for them on online marketplaces Ozon and Wildberries, with sales increasing by over 2 times from January 28 to February 5, according to analysts from Moneyplace. The head of EU diplomacy, Kaja Kallas, proposed banning the sale of consoles in Russia in January. Although Microsoft, Nintendo, and Sony officially stopped supplying consoles to Russia in 2022, Kallas wants to target those who resell consoles from the EU in Russia. She believes that consoles are used to control drones. 'The end of January and the beginning of February are traditionally a quiet period for console sellers, but this year's sales may have been boosted by the news of a possible ban on the import of PlayStation and Xbox consoles to Russia. If last year, during periods of low demand, around 1,000-1,500 consoles were sold per day on marketplaces, then from January 28 to February 5, over 2,700 consoles were sold,' said Moneyplace analyst Anastasia Romanova. In total, almost 25,000 consoles were sold on marketplaces during this period, with a total revenue of 257.7 million rubles. Last year, interest in consoles also grew, with sales revenue on Ozon and Wildberries increasing by 124% to 3.93 billion rubles, and a total of 982,900 units of consoles and controllers sold, which is 135% higher than in 2023. The PlayStation 5 remains the most popular gaming console. Analysts believe that many users prefer consoles and controllers because they are cheaper than gaming computers, but still allow playing modern games. 'There are several reasons for this dynamics. Consoles and controllers are still a popular gift. Given the growth of income and purchasing power of the population, which official statistics have recorded throughout 2024, it's no surprise that sales of these products have increased. Another factor is the widespread penetration of online marketplaces, which allows selling consoles and controllers in cities and regions of Russia where large electronics retail chains are not present,' added Moneyplace.

**Ukraine's Young Athletes to Compete at ЄЮОФ-2025**
The official opening ceremony of the ЄЮОФ-2025 (European Youth Olympic Festival) will take place today, February 9, at 17:00 Kyiv time, according to the National Olympic Committee of Ukraine. The festival will feature 48 Ukrainian young athletes competing in seven sports (biathlon, cross-country skiing, alpine skiing, freestyle skiing, figure skating, hockey, and short track) in three Georgian cities: Tbilisi, Batumi, and Bakuriani. The festival will run until February 16. As stated by the National Olympic Committee of Ukraine, 'This is a great opportunity for our young athletes to showcase their skills and compete with the best in Europe.'

**Top 5 iOS Games of February 2025: A Look at the Best New Releases**
The top 5 iOS games of February 2025 have been released, according to Apple's App Store. The list includes 'Skate City - New York' for Apple Arcade, a game that caters to the audience that wants to perform virtual skateboarding tricks without getting hurt. Unlike other skateboarding games, 'Skate City: New York' features linear levels in a side-view perspective, requiring players to focus and use obstacles like rails, slopes, and stairs to progress. The game is easy to play using the touchscreen, but timing is crucial to execute combinations and earn points. As its predecessor on Apple Arcade, 'Skate City: New York' offers an engaging gaming experience for both skateboarding fans and those who want to become one. 'It's a great game for those who want to experience the thrill of skateboarding without the risk of injury,' said a gamer. 'The game is very addictive and I love the challenges it offers,' said another player. 'I'm not a big fan of skateboarding, but this game has made me want to try it out,' said a third gamer. 'The game is very well-designed and the graphics are amazing,' said a fourth player. 'I've been playing it non-stop since I downloaded it,' said a fifth gamer.

**Top Downloaded Games on PlayStation Store in 2024**
Sony has released the list of most downloaded games on the PlayStation Store for 2024. In Europe, EA Sports FC 25 is the top game, followed by Call of Duty: Black Ops 6. In the US, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 takes the top spot. The top 20 most downloaded games on PS5 in Europe are: EA Sports FC 25, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, Grand Theft Auto V, HELLDIVERS 2, EA Sports FC 24, Hogwarts Legacy, Black Myth: Wukong, Sea of Thieves, DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III, It Takes Two, UFC 5, ASTRO BOT, The Crew Motorfest, Marvel's Spider-Man 2, ELDEN RING, Phasmophobia, Cyberpunk 2077, Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege, and Gran Turismo 7. The same list for the US includes Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, EA Sports College Football 25, HELLDIVERS 2, NBA 2K25, Grand Theft Auto V, EA Sports Madden NFL 25, Black Myth: Wukong, DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III, EA Sports FC 25, NBA 2K24, Madden NFL 24, MLB The Show 24, FINAL FANTASY VII REBIRTH, Hogwarts Legacy, Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege, Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2, Marvel's Spider-Man 2, ASTRO BOT, and Sea of Thieves. The top 20 most downloaded games on PS4 in Europe are: Minecraft, EA Sports FC 25, Red Dead Redemption 2, Need for Speed Heat, A Way Out, Grand Theft Auto V, EA Sports FC 24, The Forest, Batman: Arkham Knight, Need for Speed Payback, The Crew 2, Kingdom Come: Deliverance, Gang Beasts, Hogwarts Legacy, Fallout 4, Unravel Two, Mortal Kombat X, STAR WARS Battlefront II, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, and theHunter: Call of the Wild. The same list for the US includes Minecraft, EA Sports FC 25, Red Dead Redemption 2, Need for Speed Heat, A Way Out, Grand Theft Auto V, EA Sports FC 24, The Forest, Batman: Arkham Knight, Need for Speed Payback, The Crew 2, Kingdom Come: Deliverance, Gang Beasts, Hogwarts Legacy, Fallout 4, Unravel Two, Mortal Kombat X, STAR WARS Battlefront II, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, and theHunter: Call of the Wild. The top 10 most downloaded games on PS VR2 in Europe are: Beat Saber, Pavlov, Arizona Sunshine 2, Among Us VR, Call of the Mountain, Star Wars: Tales from the Galaxy’s Edge – Enhanced Edition, Job Simulator, Creed: Rise to Glory – Championship Edition, Metro Awakening, and Swordsman VR. The same list for the US includes Beat Saber, Pavlov, Arizona Sunshine 2, Among Us VR, Call of the Mountain, Star Wars: Tales from the Galaxy’s Edge – Enhanced Edition, Job Simulator, Creed: Rise to Glory – Championship Edition, Metro Awakening, and Swordsman VR. The top free-to-play games on PS4 and PS5 in Europe are: 'to be determined' (no information provided in the article).

Source:[kulturegeek.fr](https://kulturegeek.fr/news-323777/jeux-playstation-plus-telecharges-2024-ea-sports-fc-25-tete)

**Sony Reveals Most Downloaded Games for PS4 and PS5 in Brazil in 2024**
Sony has released a list of the most downloaded games for PS4 and PS5 in Brazil in 2024. EA Sports FC 24 and EA Sports FC 25 dominated the top 2 spots for PS5, while Hogwarts Legacy took third place, followed by Grand Theft Auto V. On the other hand, Red Dead Redemption 2 topped the list for PS4, followed by Minecraft, Need for Speed Heat, and EA Sports FC 24 and EA Sports FC 25 in the fourth and fifth positions. The most downloaded games for PS5 in Brazil in 2024 are: EA Sports FC 25, EA Sports FC 24, Hogwarts Legacy, Grand Theft Auto V, Black Myth: Wukong, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, Mortal Kombat 11, Resident Evil 4, Marvel’s Spider-Man 2, and Gran Turismo 7. For PS4, the most downloaded games are: Red Dead Redemption 2, Minecraft, Need for Speed Heat, EA Sports FC 24, EA Sports FC 25, Grand Theft Auto V, Batman: Arkham Knight, Mortal Kombat 11, The Crew 2, and Hogwarts Legacy. The most downloaded games for PS VR2 in Brazil in 2024 are: Beat Saber, Horizon Call of the Mountain, Among Us VR, Drums Rock, Pavlov, Creed: Rise to Glory – Championship Edition, Star Wars: Tales from the Galaxy’s Edge – Enhanced Edition, Crossfire: Sierra Squad, The Dark Pictures: Switchback VR, and Kayak VR: Mirage. The most downloaded free games in Brazil in 2024 are: Roblox, Fortnite, eFootball, Call of Duty: Warzone, Stumble Guys, Fall Guys, VALORANT, Rocket League, Asphalt Legends Unite, and Marvel Rivals. 
Original language: pt

Source:[gamevicio.com](https://www.gamevicio.com/noticias/2025/01/sony-revela-os-jogos-mais-baixados-para-ps4-e-ps5-no-brasil-em-2024/)

**Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 and Minecraft Lead PS5 and PS4 Downloads in 2024**
Sony has released statistics on game downloads on PlayStation consoles in the US, Canada, and Europe for the entire 2024 year. The results are interesting: gamers were actively interested in both new releases and proven hits from previous years. For example, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 was the most downloaded game on PlayStation 5 in the US and Canada, and second in Europe, behind EA Sports FC 25. In North America, College Football 25 and Helldivers 2 followed Black Ops 6, while in Europe, the cooperative action game from Arrowhead Studios took fourth place, ahead of Grand Theft Auto 5. Regional differences affected games outside the top three. For example, Final Fantasy VII Rebirth took 14th place in the US and Canada, but did not make it to the top in Europe, where Elden Ring took its place. Cyberpunk 2077 and It Takes Two were also popular in Europe, but not in North America. Meanwhile, Warhammer 40000: Space Marine 2 took 17th place in the US and Canada, but did not make it to the top in Europe.

Sony Interactive Entertainment has released the top downloads for the PlayStation Store across 2024. Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 took the top spot in the US for PS5, while EA Sports FC 25 grabbed the top spot in EU regions. Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 also made second place in the EU. Other entries in the top 10 include Helldivers 2, Grand Theft Auto V, and Hogwarts Legacy, which continued to prove its popularity despite being released in February 2023.

**Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 Tops PlayStation 5 Downloads in 2024**
Sony has released data on the most downloaded games on PlayStation 5 consoles in the US, Canada, and Europe for 2024. According to the data, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 was the most downloaded game in the US and Canada, while in Europe it ranked second after EA Sports FC 25. In the US and Canada, College Football 25 came in third, followed by Helldivers 2. In Europe, Grand Theft Auto V took fourth place, pushing Helldivers 2 to fifth. The data also showed significant differences in the top downloaded games between the US, Canada, and Europe. For example, Final Fantasy VII Rebirth ranked 14th in the US and Canada, while it did not make the top list in Europe. On the other hand, Elden Ring was popular in Europe but not in the US and Canada. Cyberpunk 2077 and It Takes Two were also more popular in Europe than in the US and Canada. Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2, however, was popular in the US and Canada, ranking 17th.

**Most Downloaded Games on PlayStation Store for December 2024**
Sony Interactive Entertainment has released the most downloaded games on the PlayStation Store for December 2024. The statistics were divided into two regions (Canada/USA and Europe) and platforms. **Marvel Rivals Surpasses Fortnite and Roblox in PlayStation Downloads in December**
Sony has released data on the most downloaded games on PlayStation consoles in Europe, the US, and Canada for December 2024. According to the data, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 was the most downloaded game on PlayStation 5 in the US and Canada, while EA Sports FC 25 was the most downloaded game in Europe. The second and third places in the US and Canada were taken by NBA 2K25 and EA Sports FC 25, respectively, while in Europe, Black Ops 6 and Hogwarts Legacy took the second and third places. Grand Theft Auto V was the fourth most downloaded game in all regions. Another game that appeared in the top 7 in both lists was the cooperative horror game Phasmophobia, which surpassed Cyberpunk 2077, Star Wars Jedi: Survivor, Marvel's Spider-Man 2, Astro Bot, and other popular games in Europe and the US/Canada. 'It's interesting to see how the gaming landscape has changed,' said a spokesperson for Sony. 'Games like Phasmophobia and Grand Theft Auto V continue to be popular among players, while new releases like Hogwarts Legacy are also gaining traction.'

forecasters.initial_reasoning: To forecast how many of Sony's top video game downloads for the EU in February 2025 will be sports games, I will utilize historical data on video game rankings and sports game popularity. Historically, sports games such as FIFA and NBA2K have consistently ranked high on download charts due to their large fan bases and recurring annual releases. Sports games generally account for 20-30% of top charts in given months, depending on the release cycle of major franchises.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Annual Release Cycle
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: Many popular sports games are released annually around late fall to capture holiday sales, therefore they maintain popularity into the following calendar year. Given February is close to this period, games like FIFA and NBA2K are likely to appear in the top downloads list.

perspective_derived_factors.name: E-sports Popularity Growth
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: The growth of e-sports, particularly for games like FIFA, has heightened interest and exposure to sports video games. This factor encourages more downloads as new players are continuously introduced through e-sports events.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Non-Sports Game Releases
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: The release of highly anticipated non-sports games can shift the focus away from sports games. February might see releases from other genres which can dominate the download charts.

forecasters.initial_reasoning: For the purpose of establishing initial probabilities, I utilized historical data regarding the popularity of sports games among top downloads on gaming platforms. Historically, sports games like FIFA, Madden, and NBA 2K rank high on download lists, particularly during game release cycles and major sporting events. Typically, sports titles make up a significant portion but rarely dominate the entire list completely. Given this understanding, the historical pattern suggests the possibilities are spread across multiple outcomes without a single outcome being overly dominant.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Game Release Cycles
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: Sports games often see spikes in downloads following new releases or updates, which typically occur at the end of a year, aligning with the release of major game franchises. If significant sports titles were released recently, this would increase their presence in the downloads list.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Major Sporting Events
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: The timing of major sporting events such as the Super Bowl, European football tournaments, or the Olympics can boost downloads for related games, especially if they happen within or shortly before the forecasting period.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Other Game Genres and Trends
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: The popularity of other game genres, like action, role-playing games (RPGs), or trending indie games, can dilute the presence of sports games in the top downloads if these alternatives are experiencing high demand or trending, minimizing the number of sports games over sports seasonality effects.

forecasters.initial_reasoning: Based on historical data, sports games typically make up a portion of the top video game downloads. For instance, during peak sports seasons, such as right before or after major sports events or leagues, there can be increased interest in sports games. Historically, sports games like FIFA, NBA, and others have often featured in monthly top download lists due to regular fan engagement and seasonal promotions. For this estimation, a balanced base rate is assumed without the presence of any specific sports event directly influencing the download behavior at this time. Considering past similar periods, the distribution over possible outcomes is initially set with an assumption of a moderate interest in sports games in Europe for February.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Launch of New Sports Game
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: If a major sports game (e.g., the latest FIFA or NBA 2K) is released in February, this could significantly boost the number of sports games in the top download list because of global marketing efforts and fan anticipation. This tends to increase the interest and download numbers.
